content:
I am a second year Ph.D. student at the Lab for Nuclear Science and the Statistics and Data Science Center at MIT. I am mainly interested in research at the interface between machine learning and physics. I work on problems in AI fairness and interpretability applied to high energy physics physics. I am also interested in geometric learning and graph based architectures to improve our understanding of collider data.
 Download my resum√©.--

title: Ouail Kitouni
